properties.name: gateway.dubbo.registry.address
properties.description: Dubbo注册中心地址，如：redis://127.0.0.1:6379 或 zookeeper://127.0.0.1:2181等

properties.name: gateway.dubbo.openservice
properties.description: 是否只限制访问声明了openservice的接口

properties.name: gateway.netty.server.host
properties.description: 网关服务启动Host，未配置取本机IP

properties.name: gateway.netty.server.connect-timeout
properties.description: 客户端调用服务端接口的超时时间，单位：毫秒

properties.name: gateway.netty.business.thread-count
properties.description: Gateway HTTP线程池处理线程数
